item.title: 85% Rule
item.description: 85% Rule If you can solve 85% of a users problems with software, they will be willing to live with manual processes for the remaining 15%.

item.title: Efficiency is Doing Things Right. Effectiveness is Doing the Right Things.
item.description: Efficiency is Doing Things Right. Effectiveness is Doing the Right Things. [[Power Law Distribution]] [[80-20 Rule]]

item.title: "In the Long-run, Prioritization Beats efficiency."
item.description: “In the Long-run, Prioritization Beats efficiency.” References (References:: [[James Clear]])

item.title: Don't spend time on useless things
item.description: Don’t Spend Time on Useless Things [[James Clear]] “It’s better to be alone than to spend time with toxic people.

item.title: 80-20 Rule
item.description: 80-20 Rule 80% of the results come from 20% of the effort. [[Power Law Distribution]]
